# Makefile automatically generated by ghdl
# Version: GHDL 0.35 (tarball) [Dunoon edition] - mcode code generator
# Command used to generate this makefile:
# C:\Program Files (x86)\ghdl\bin\ghdl.exe --gen-makefile hello_world

GHDL=C:\Program Files (x86)\ghdl\bin\ghdl.exe
GHDLFLAGS=
GHDLRUNFLAGS=

# Default target : elaborate
all : elab

# Elaborate target.  Almost useless
elab : force
	$(GHDL) -c $(GHDLFLAGS) -e hello_world

# Run target
run : force
	$(GHDL) -c $(GHDLFLAGS) -r hello_world $(GHDLRUNFLAGS)

# Targets to analyze libraries
init: force
	# C:\Program Files (x86)\ghdl\lib\v93\ieee\std_logic_1164.v93
	# C:\Program Files (x86)\ghdl\lib\v93\ieee\std_logic_1164_body.v93
	$(GHDL) -a $(GHDLFLAGS) .\hello.vhd

force:
